title: Luna Blaster Neo
paragraphs: The Luna Blaster Neo is a main weapon in the Splatoon series It is a Neo-branded variant of the Luna Blaster.

In Splatoon and Splatoon 2, the Luna Blaster Neo is nearly identical in appearance to the Luna Blaster, with the only difference being a sticker bearing the Neo icon on the front half of the blaster in the former and the Neo icon and logo written in Inkling embossed on the front half of the blaster in the latter.
In Splatoon 3, the Luna Blaster Neo's body is black instead of its base counterpart's white.
The Luna Blaster Neo was released on 30 October 2015 at 02:00 UTC.[1][2] It comes in a set with Splat Bombs and the Bomb Rush.
- Promotional image
- An Inkling boy running with a Luna Blaster Neo.
- A Luna Blaster Neo's projectile in mid-air.
- A Luna Blaster Neo's projectile upon explosion.
- Official art of an Inkling holding the Luna Blaster Neo.
- SplatNet icon
The Luna Blaster Neo was released on 24 February 2018 at 02:00 UTC.[4] It comes in a set with Ink Mines and the Suction-Bomb Launcher.
- An Inkling holding the Luna Blaster Neo in the air.
- Barrage of Suction-Bomb Launcher.

The Luna Blaster Neo returns in Splatoon 3 with a new black design, coming with Fizzy Bombs and the Ultra Stamp. It was first shown in the Chill Season 2022 announcement trailer on 14 November 2022. It released on 1 December 2022 along with the release of the season.
